text: This is a list of notable private schools in Nashville, Tennessee: ==Nashville proper== *Christ Presbyterian Academy *Davidson Academy *Donelson Christian Academy *Ensworth School *Father Ryan High School *Franklin Road Academy *Goodpasture Christian School *Harding Academy *Harpeth Hall School *Lipscomb Academy *Madison Academy *Montgomery Bell Academy *Nashville Christian School *Pope John Paul II High School *St. Cecilia Academy *St. Paul Christian Academy *University School of Nashville ==Metropolitan area== ==See also== *List of high schools in Tennessee#Davidson County ==References== Category:Private schools in Tennessee
title: List of private schools in Nashville, Tennessee
